overview:
Matt D’Andria is CEO of Motorator.com - a community for performance automotive enthusiasts - and co-host of Adam Carolla’s CarCast.

Prior to Motorator, Matt was CEO of Cnation, a web development consultancy he co-founded with Adam Pisoni. Cnation developed interactive and technology solutions for high profile brands such as CBS MarketWatch, BizRate.com, Fox Interactive, eToys, Nissan, Kia, and Honda - which won the 1997 Clio Award for technical achievement.

CarCast is a podcast and Internet video show dedicated to automotive enthusiasts hosted by actor/comedian Adam Carolla and Matt D’Andria. It is the only show of its kind that combines aspects of the automotive space, from hot rods to super cars, with an entertaining humor and expertise that only Adam and Matt can bring. CarCast often features guests from the automotive industry and celebrity car enthusiasts such as Jay Leno, Chip Foose, Billy Gibbons (ZZ Top), Michael Anthony (Van Halen & Chickenfoot), Bill Goldberg (WWE) and many more.
